children.value: Access to the HMAC validation function requires a Cloudflare Pro, Business, or Enterprise plan.
to validate hash-based message authentication code (HMAC) tokens in a Firewall Rules expression.

Since the expression in this example uses the

Use the same secret key to protect multiple paths
You can use the same secret key to protect multiple URI paths.
This is illustrated in the example above, where
is passed as the MessageMAC argument to the validation function.
includes the path to the asset and that value is extracted for each request, the validation function evaluates all request URIs to
Note that while you can use the same secret key to authenticate multiple paths, you must generate an HMAC token for each unique message you want to authenticate.
